Descripci\u00f3n: Halflings stand about 3 feet tall and usually weigh between 30 and 35 pounds. They have brown or black eyes. Halfling men often have long sideburns, but beards are rare among them and mustaches almost unseen. Halflings prefer simple, comfortable, and practical clothes. Unlike members of most races, they prefer actual comfort to shows of wealth. Halflings reach adulthood in their early twenties and generally live into the middle of their second century. Halflings speak Halfling and Common.Most halflings encountered outside their home are warriors; the information in the statistics block is for one of 1st level.

Combate: Halflings prefer to fight defensively, usually hiding and launching ranged attacks as the foe approaches.
